newsitem.title: RUSSIA: SOCCER-LOKOMOTIV MOSCOW BEAT DYNAMO IN RUSSIAN CUP FINAL.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-LOKOMOTIV MOSCOW BEAT DYNAMO IN RUSSIAN CUP FINAL.

text.p: Lokomotiv Moscow retained the Russian Cup with a 2-0 victory over local rivals Dynamo 2-0 in the final on Wednesday.
Alexander Smirnov and Yevgeny Kharlachev scored the goals which earned Lokomotiv their place in next season's European Cup Winners' Cup.
In the 25th minute Smirnov received a pass from Kharlachev and beat Dynamo goalkeeper Andrei Smetanin from close range.
With 12 minutes remaining Andrei Solomatin provided a nice pass for Kharlachev to score in an empty net.
Lokomotiv's Russian international goalkeeper Sergei Ovchinnikov, who is due to leave for Portugal next month on a four-year contract with Benfica, said it was nice to go out with a win.
